mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Unlock exclusive perks and privileges just for being you.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into the Bank of Entitlement branch like the king that I am. I needed some cash for my impromptu trip to Bora Bora because, you know, a yacht is no place for a man without his stacks of cash. I confidently strutted up to the teller, ready to make it rain. But when I requested my money, the teller had the audacity to ask for my ID! Can you believe it? Me, Hot Josh, needing to prove my identity in my own bank! Outrageous. I could feel the heat rising in my face as I demanded to see the manager. When the manager arrived, I made sure to let her know that this level of disrespect was unacceptable. I mean, did she not know who I was? The nerve! I demanded a public apology, a refund of all my fees, and a personal escort to my yacht in Bora Bora.After some back and forth, the manager caved and agreed to all my demands. As I boarded my private jet, sipping champagne and waving goodbye to the bank, I couldn't help but chuckle to myself. Being Hot Josh isn't easy, but moments like these make it all worth it. After all, why be just a customer when you can be a king?
